participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, Emma loves helping others and finds joy in volunteering.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Playful and curious, Liam enjoys exploring the world around him and loves to sing.
participant_2.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. i'm four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters.

content.text: hi how are you doing tonight? i am doing well.
what are your hobbies? i volunteer at a local community hospital.
what do you do for a living? i work in a ship yard.
i'm a volunteer. it is very rewarding.
do you have any hobbies? mine is volunteering.
